text: (Those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and do right) acts of worship such none is aware of them except Allah: (Joy is for them) blessedness is for them; it is also said that this refers to a tree in Paradise, the trunk of which is made of gold and the leaves of vestments, the fruits of different colours and whose branches are in succession in Paradise, and under which are dunes of musk, ambergris and saffron, (and bliss (their) journey's end) Paradise is their returning place.
